messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: WARNING! WARNING! UNKNOWN ENERGY SOURCES DETECTED AT BOTH SIDES OF STATION. WARNING!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: RUN and run FASTER than SONIC

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Escape Pod Three.
